mapper.select: SELECT info.id, info.coupon_type, info.name, info.amount, info.discount, info.condition_amount, info.publish_count, info.per_limit, info.expire_time, info.description FROM coupon_info info LEFT JOIN (SELECT coupon_id,customer_id,COUNT(coupon_id) cnt FROM `customer_coupon` WHERE customer_id = {#customerId} GROUP BY coupon_id) cc ON info.id = cc.coupon_id WHERE info.publish_count > info.receive_count AND (cc.cnt < info.per_limit or info.per_limit = 0 or cc.cnt is null) ORDER BY info.id ASC;

SELECT info.id, info.coupon_type, info.name, info.amount, info.discount, info.condition_amount, info.publish_count, info.per_limit, info.expire_time, info.description,
cstr.receive_time FROM coupon_info info JOIN customer_coupon cstr ON info.id = cstr.coupon_id WHERE cstr.expire_time > NOW() AND cstr.`status` = 1 and cstr.customer_id = {#customerId} ORDER BY info.id ASC

SELECT info.id, info.coupon_type, info.name, info.amount, info.discount, info.condition_amount, info.publish_count, info.per_limit, info.expire_time, info.description,
cstr.id as customerCouponId, cstr.used_time FROM coupon_info info JOIN customer_coupon cstr ON info.id = cstr.coupon_id WHERE AND cstr.`status` = 2 and cstr.customer_id = {#customerId} ORDER BY info.id ASC
mapper.update: update coupon_info set receive_count = receive_count + 1 where id = #{id}
